channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Boîte de réception | Iran, antivirus et Radio-Canada
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on se demande comment les États font pour débrancher l’internet, on remet en question l’importance des logiciels antivirus et on s’interroge sur le site web de Radio-Canada.

item.title: Shell Fragment Found Fitted With Strange Tag Sparks Internet Mystery
item.description: A snorkeler in Australia found a shell tagged with a strangely specific number, kickstarting an online mystery about its origins.

item.title: Silent Hill fans have a great excuse to check out Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly Remake as Koei Tecmo and Konami announce collaboration
item.description: Koei Tecmo announces Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly Remake demo and a collaboration with one of the best horror games of the decade.

item.title: Netatmo relance ses icônes : thermostat et caméra reviennent en version « Original »
item.description: Netatmo, fleuron de la maison connectée, désormais intégré au sein du groupe Legrand, opère un retour aux sources stratégique. La marque vient de dévoiler sa nouvelle gamme « Original » qui remet sur le devant de la scène ses best-sellers : le thermostat intelligent et la caméra extérieure. Si la promesse de durabilité et d'économies est toujours là, cette nouvelle gamme marque une rupture avec les précédents produits. ...

item.title: Google Messages se dote d’un nouveau sélecteur de photos
item.description: L’application de messagerie de Google intègre un nouveau sélecteur de photos qui vous donnera rapidement accès à vos différentes collections.

item.title: Test du iRobot Roomba Max 705 Combo : deux semaines à l’essai
item.description: iRobot joue gros. Après avoir régné sans partage, la marque américaine s'est fait doubler sur l'IA et le lavage par des Roborock ou des Dreame survoltés. Le Roomba Max 705 Combo veut prouver qu’on peut encore innover avec un système de rouleau-serpillère inédit et une puissance d'aspiration de 13 000 Pa.

item.title: 'The current situation is extremely serious' — Zotac warns that graphics card makers could be wiped out by memory crisis
item.description: The RAM crisis looms large in the PC hardware market, and now a graphics card maker has issued a warning for consumers.

item.title: Panera Bread reportedly hit by worrying data breach that sees 14 million records exposed - here's what we know
item.description: ShinyHunters stole names, addresses, and more, from Panera Bread systems.

item.title: This ereader is 'the Kindle of your dreams in color' and it's just dropped to its lowest price since Black Friday
item.description: The Kindle Colorsoft is the best Kindle for many people – and it's on sale now at Amazon for an excellent price.

item.title: 6 Best VPN Services (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Every VPN says it’s the best, but only some of them are telling the truth.

item.title: Pendant les soldes d’hiver, ce pack GoPro Hero 13 à -23 % est la bonne affaire avant de partir au ski
item.description: Avec ce pack de Boulanger, votre GoPro Hero 13 pourra exploiter son plein potentiel grâce aux trois batteries et au chargeur fournis tandis qu'une carte SD pourra venir se glisser dans l'Action Cam. L'ensemble perd 120 euros sur le site de l'enseigne et tombe à 399,99 euros.

item.title: Stop worrying about storms — the Anker Solix C1000 portable power station can keep the lights and other essentials powered on, and it’s £140 off right now
item.description: Anker Solix C1000 portable power station is just £509 and delivers 1800W power, 2400W surge, and rapid recharging.

item.title: Shrinking Season 3 review: My heart cant take it
item.description: "Shrinking" is back for Season 3, with Jason Segel, Harrison Ford, Jessica Williams, and more. TV review.

item.title: 'We’re still early, but it’s clear that AI will play a meaningful role in how science advances': OpenAI launches free Prism app for scientific research
item.description: OpenAI says 2026 will be the year AI "accelerate[s] discovery in several ways" and reduces the friction involve with research.

item.title: Microsoft is finally fixing Windows 11 under the hood — but new stats suggest it could be too little, too late
item.description: Microsoft is working to smooth out the inner workings of Windows 11, but I'm struggling to have any confidence in this effort.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Sleep, as Tested by Our Team
item.description: Sleep is the one thing every giftee needs, and you can help them get it. These are our tried-and-tested picks for giftable sleep aids, from masks to melatonin.

item.title: Bandai’s ‘Marvel vs. Capcom’ Figures Just Keep Getting Better and Better
item.description: Wolverine joins the fray for a berserker barrage or two, as the SH Figuarts 'Gamerverse' line adds another Marvel icon.

item.title: No Phone, No Social Safety Net: Welcome to the ‘Offline Club’
item.description: Across Europe’s largest cities, people are gathering for semi-silent, offline hangouts, in search of an experience that isn’t mediated through their smartphones.

item.title: Google’s Smart Glasses Will Have the Best Software. But They’ll Have to Win on Style Too
item.description: When Google releases its smart glasses in the coming months, the strength of its AI-powered software will be its biggest leg up on its rivals. But will people want to be seen wearing them?

item.title: Grok is the most antisemitic chatbot according to the ADL
item.description: Across six top large language models, xAI's Grok performed the worst at identifying and countering antisemitic content, according to a study published Wednesday by the Anti-Defamation League. On the other end of the spectrum, Anthropic's Claude performed the best according to the report's metrics, but the ADL said all models had gaps that required improvement. […]...

item.title: How to watch the 2026 Sundance Film Festival online from anywhere
item.description: Here’s how you can watch the 2026 Sundance Film Festival online and from anywhere. Find streaming options and the complete film lineup in one place.

item.title: Amazon's latest round of layoffs will affect 16,000 workers
item.description: Amazon has confirmed that it’s letting go of 16,000 workers and employees across its organization. In an announcement by company SVP Beth Galetti, she explained that Amazon was going through organizational changes to reduce layers and remove bureaucracy. Affected employees in the US will be given 90 days to look for another internal role and will receive severance pay if they do not find any. Galetti also said that Amazon doesn’t have plans to announce “broad reductions every few months” but admitted that the company could “make adjustments as appropriate.”News about the layoffs was leaked in ...

item.title: Windscribe review: Despite the annoyances, it has the right idea
item.description: Windscribe is a virtual private network (VPN) with intense "How do you do, fellow kids?" energy. It has servers in 69 countries and an annual plan that costs $69, an obsession with the sex number that rivals Elon Musk's. I'm shocked that it doesn't have a subscription costing $4.20 per month. But there's another side to Windscribe's cringe: an obsession with independence and a Bernie Sanders-like anger on behalf of an exploited public. In a market where the best VPNs aim for professionalism, Windscribe aspires to be punk. Its iconoclasm may have led it to develop an app that looks like Express...

item.title: « J’adopte le Québec Tech » | Des technologies d’ici pour améliorer la productivité des PME
item.description: Connaissez-vous eZsign ? C’est la preuve très tangible qu’il est possible pour les entreprises québécoises d’améliorer leur productivité en misant sur des technologies locales. Et ce n’est qu’une seule des quelque 4000 technologies québécoises que le programme « J’adopte le Québec Tech » veut faire connaître aux PME de la province.

item.title: Sam Altman admits OpenAI ‘screwed up’ the writing quality on ChatGPT 5.2 – and promises future versions won’t ‘neglect’ it
item.description: ChatGPT 5.2’s writing ability was ‘screwed up,’ Sam Altman said at a recent town hall meeting – but improvements are on the way.

item.title: Stephen Colbert confirms final show date to Seth Meyers, speaks about future plans
item.description: Stephen Colbert spoke to Seth Meyers about the end of "The Late Show" and rumors about what he plans to do next.

item.title: 2025's most interesting drone – the Antigravity A1 – just got its first-ever price cut and an intriguing feature for new pilots
item.description: Been eying up the Antigravity A1? Now this powerful and unique model is 15% cheaper and offers a new Flight Simulator mode for new pilots.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for January 28, 2026
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for January 28, 2026

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for January 28, 2026
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1684 on January 28 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: I tested the Elegoo Centauri Carbon 2 Combo - and it's another impressive machine at an unbelievable price
item.description: The Centauri Carbon 2 Combo is the much-anticipated follow-up to the original Centauri Carbon, and once again offers a CoreXY design, but now thankfully with an integrated CANVAS multicolour module. The result is a remarkably compact printer in line with the competition, just cheaper and far more robust.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for January 28, 2026
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: How to unblock Pornhub for free in the UK
item.description: How to unblock porn for free in the UK. Unblock and watch Pornhub for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: « Linux est notre prochaine grande frontière » : la promesse de GOG qui va tout changer pour les joueurs PC
item.description: La plateforme de jeu rétro et indépendante GOG va elle aussi miser sur Linux en 2026 alors qu'une version native est visiblement en projet.

item.title: Apple Patches Old Versions of iOS to Keep iMessage and FaceTime Running
item.description: Apple is renewing certificates for iOS versions dating back to 2013 to keep the lights on a little longer.

item.title: ‘Don’t worry, I’ve got you’: 3 artists channel the outrage of Minneapolis
item.description: “I wanted to make something beautiful that [Alex Pretti’s] parents could look at and be proud of him for that.” —graffiti artist Topsy Artist Edel Rodriguez published his new print, Minneapolis, just hours after a federal agent shot and killed ICU nurse Alex Pretti on January 24. The print features a pop art image of President Donald Trump, mouth agape and gun in hand, kneeling on the neck of Lady Liberty, who’s slowly bleeding out on the street from multiple gunshot wounds....

item.title: Ce chargeur sans fil et rapide de 50 W soldé à moitié prix recharge votre smartphone et le protège contre la chaleur
item.description: Avec sa puissance de charge de 50 W et son dissipateur thermique, ce chargeur Airvooc pourra recharger votre smartphone en toute sécurité. Pendant les soldes d'hiver, il perd 50 % de son prix et passe de 69,99 euros à 34,99 euros sur le site de la marque.

item.title: Hurry! With storms causing outages, the Mango Power E portable power station is just $1,399 — a huge $2,851 saving that helps keep the lights on
item.description: Mango Power E home backup and portable power station is 67% off at $1,399 and includes four AC outlets, USB-C up to 100W, and RV 30A support.

item.title: Stephen Colbert drops truths about the Melania doc
item.description: The White House is heavily promoting the 'Melania' doc but the box office shows another story, as Stephen Colbert points out.

item.title: Carrefour est généreux pour la fin des soldes, mais voici les 11 deals qui valent le coup à la dernière démarque
item.description: La dernière démarque est lancée et Carrefour n'a pas dit son dernier mot pour brader un tas de produits Tech ! Que vous ayez envie d'une tablette, d'un nouveau TV ou d'un téléphone abordable, il y a de quoi vous faire plaisir !

item.title: Plus d’autonomie pour le même prix : BMW améliore ses 2 voitures électriques les plus accessibles
item.description: BMW vient d'apporter quelques améliorations techniques à ses voitures électriques les plus vendues : l'iX1 et l'iX2, sa déclinaison coupé. Les deux SUV dépassent les 500 km d'autonomie grâce à une consommation en baisse... mais leurs concurrents font souvent mieux.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel trolls Melania Trump over her new documentary
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel has mocked a recent Fox News interview with Melania Trump to promote her new documentary.

item.title: Aluminium OS : Google dévoile par erreur l’interface de son « Android pour PC »
item.description: Les premières images de l’interface du remplaçant de Chrome OS ont fuité en ligne. Voici à quoi ressemblera le futur système d’exploitation pour PC de Google.

item.title: Utiliser votre Galaxy S26 même sans réseau mobile ? Ce sera possible, mais pas pour tout le monde
item.description: À quelques semaines de leur présentation officielle, les futurs Samsung Galaxy S26 ont déjà été certifiés aux États-Unis. L'occasion d'en découvrir davantage sur leur connectivité compatible avec le satellite.

item.title: Windows 11’s ability to resume Android apps on your PC is getting closer
item.description: Microsoft is getting ready to improve Windows 11's ability to resume Android apps on a PC. The software giant first introduced its cross-device resume last year, letting Windows 11 users resume OneDrive sessions from their Android device on a PC. Now, it's expanding this to Spotify playback, browsing sessions, and more. The improved cross-device resume […]...

item.title: Astronomers used AI to find 1,400 ‘anomalous objects’ from Hubble archives
item.description: A pair of astronomers at the European Space Agency (ESA) discovered more than 800 previously undocumented "astrophysical anomalies" hiding in Hubble's archives. To do so, researchers David O'Ryan and Pablo Gómez trained an AI model to comb through Hubble's 35-year dataset, hunting for strange objects and flagging them for manual review. It's "a treasure trove […]...

item.title: L’IA rafle tout : ce géant de la mémoire a déjà vendu toute sa production pour 2026
item.description: SK Hynix, l'un des principaux fournisseurs de mémoire du monde, dévoile des résultats records pour l'année 2025. Et au vu de la situation actuelle du marché, cela ne fait que commencer.

item.title: The Pokémon TCG Prismatic Evolutions Booster Packs are below market value at Amazon
item.description: Pokémon TCG Prismatic Evolutions booster packs are down to $12.96 at Amazon, beating TCGplayer and Walmart prices.

item.title: Google lance l’alerte : si vous avez WinRAR, supprimez-le vite
item.description: Google a découvert une faille de sécurité dans WinRAR activement utilisée. Il est temps de changer de logiciel.

item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: Google ajoute de nouveaux antivols pour les smartphones Android
item.description: Les équipes de Google travaillent sur de nouvelles solutions de sécurité pour éviter la récupération de données sensibles lors du vol d’un smartphone.

item.title: C’est officiel : le Galaxy S26 Ultra aura une fonction unique qu’aucun autre smartphone ne possède
item.description: Samsung confirme enfin l'atout maître du Galaxy S26 Ultra. Grâce à une technologie d'écran inédite, votre smartphone deviendra illisible pour vos voisins de métro, sans avoir besoin d'ajouter un filtre adhésif.
